name: Bee Wars (itch)
description:
A realtime multiplayer 3rd person strategy game. You play as a Liutenant Beer, giving orders to a small team of collectors (workers) / fighters (dog-bee). Your objective is to collect resources from a limited amount of flowers (pollen and nectar) what you use to raise your queen and/or to feed your queen to produce more workers/fighters. Win the game the player who raise your queen for the highest level. Lose the game if your queen die. up to 4-6 players 2 minimum/maximum 6

The game supports up to 10 players at once so have fun flying around as a bee!

Note:  it didn't come together quite like we wanted but we're uploading it to look back on if we decide to take another stab at the idea.
